name: metabase-mcp
description: A high-performance MCP server for Metabase analytics data access with response optimization and robust error handling.
long_description: This MCP server provides AI assistants with optimized access to Metabase analytics data. Features up to 90% token reduction through response optimization, comprehensive error handling with structured responses, and tools for searching, listing, retrieving, and exporting data from Metabase instances. Includes concurrent processing, pagination support, and export capabilities for large datasets. Supports both API key and email/password authentication methods.

tools.name: search
tools.description: Search across all Metabase items using native search API

tools.name: list
tools.description: Fetch all records for a single Metabase resource type

tools.name: retrieve
tools.description: Fetch detailed information for specific items with concurrent processing

tools.name: execute
tools.description: Execute SQL queries or run saved cards against Metabase databases. Warning: Can execute destructive SQL operations.

tools.name: export
tools.description: Export large datasets in CSV, JSON, or XLSX formats

tools.name: clear_cache
tools.description: Clear the internal cache for stored data

metabase_api_key.title: API Key
metabase_api_key.description: Metabase API Key. Leave empty for email/password authentication.

metabase_user_email.title: User Email
metabase_user_email.description: Metabase User Email. Leave empty for API key authentication.

metabase_password.title: Password
metabase_password.description: Metabase User Password. Leave empty for API key authentication.

read_only_mode.title: Read-Only Mode
read_only_mode.description: When enabled, restricts the execute tool to SELECT queries only. Write operations (INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE, DROP, etc.) will be blocked.

export_directory.title: Export Directory
export_directory.description: Directory where exported files will be saved
